mapper.select: SELECT TB.* FROM ( SELECT TB_1.BC_NO AS BC_NO , TB_2.BASE_PD_CD AS BASE_PD_CD , TB_3.PD_PRP_VAL01 AS USWY_DV_CD , TB_1.PDCT_PD_CD AS PDCT_PD_CD , ( CASE WHEN TB_11.SVPD_ITEM_GR = '92' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS FARM_YN , TB_11.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS ITEM_NM , TB_1.CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , TB_1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , TB_5.RCGVP_KNM AS CUST_NM , '' AS HNO_NO , TB_6.LOCARA_TNO , TB_6.EXNO_ENCR /* 복호화 */ , TB_6.IDV_TNO , '' AS CSMR_YR /* 빈값 전달 */ , '' AS CSMR_CD /* 빈값 전달 */ , TB_8.RNADR || ' ' || TB_8.RDADR AS ADDR , TB_8.NEW_ADR_ZIP AS ZIPNO , TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AS EMP_ID , TB_7.PRTNR_KNM AS EMP_NM , TB_7.OG_NM AS DEPT_NM , '' AS MNG_HP_NO , TB_6.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , TB_6.MEXNO_ENCR /* 복호화 */ , TB_6.CRAL_IDV_TNO , TB_9.VST_CNFMDT AS VST_DT , ( SELECT TEMP.CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND TEMP.TENANT_ID = #{session.tenantId} AND TEMP.CD_ID = 'VST_DV_CD' AND TEMP.CD_VLD_VAL = TB_12.VST_DV_CD AND TEMP.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS MNG_TYP , TB_2.SV_PRD || '개월' AS MNG_CYC , TB_10.BLD_NM AS DBLD_NM , ( CASE WHEN TB_11.SVPD_ITEM_KND = '5' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS FILTER_YN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD, TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO ORDER BY TB_9.VST_DUEDT DESC, TB_9.VST_EXP_HH DESC) AS RNK FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ TB_1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL TB_2 ON ( TB_1.CNTR_NO = TB_2.CNTR_NO AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = TB_2.CNTR_SN ) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL TB_3 ON ( TB_1.SV_PD_CD = TB_3.PD_CD AND TB_3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SCHD' ) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL TB_4 ON ( TB_1.CNTR_NO = TB_4.DTL_CNTR_NO AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = TB_4.DTL_CNTR_SN AND TB_4.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' /* 2:배송지 3:설치지 */ ) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS TB_5 ON ( TB_4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = TB_5.CNTR_ADRPC_ID ) INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS TB_6 ON ( TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = TB_6.OG_TP_CD AND TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = TB_6.PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ TB_7 ON ( TB_7.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND TB_6.OG_TP_CD = TB_7.OG_TP_CD AND TB_6.PRTNR_NO = TB_7.PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS TB_8 ON ( TB_5.ADR_ID = TB_8.ADR_ID ) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ TB_9 ON ( TB_6.OG_TP_CD = TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND TB_6.PRTNR_NO = TB_9.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ TB_10 ON ( TB_7.BASE_YM = TB_10.BASE_YM AND TB_7.OG_ID = TB_10.OG_ID ) INNER JOIN () TB_11 ON ( TB_1.PDCT_PD_CD = TB_11.SVPD_PD_CD ) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ TB_12 ON ( TB_9.CNTR_NO = TB_12.CNTR_NO AND TB_9.CNTR_SN = TB_12.CNTR_SN AND TB_9.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD = TB_12.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD AND TB_9.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = TB_12.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND TB_9.WK_SN = TB_12.WK_SN ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.BC_NO = #{qrcd} ) TB WHERE 1=1 AND TB.RNK = 1

SELECT IST_DT ,(CASE WHEN USE_DAY >= 360 THEN TRUNC(USE_DAY/360)|| '년' ELSE '' END) || (CASE WHEN USE_DAY >= 30 THEN MOD(TRUNC(USE_DAY/30),12) || '개월' ELSE '1개월' END) AS USE_MONTH ,MANAGER_NAME ,CRAL_LOCARA_TNO ,MEXNO_ENCR ,CRAL_IDV_TNO ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NEXT_SCHEDULE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NEXT_SCHEDULE ,RENTAL_FEE ,DEVICE_NAME ,'' AS MANAGER_TEL /* Dto Constructor로 인한 문제로 빈 컬럼 생성 */ FROM ( SELECT TB_1.CNTR_NO ,TB_1.CNTR_SN ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TB_1.IST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IST_DT /* 설치일자 */ ,TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(TB_1.IST_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS USE_DAY /* 사용개월수 */ , TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO , TB_2.PRTNR_KNM || ' 매니저' AS MANAGER_NAME /* 매니저명 */ , TB_2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , TB_2.MEXNO_ENCR AS MEXNO_ENCR , TB_2.CRAL_IDV_TNO AS CRAL_IDV_TNO ,( SELECT MIN(TEMP.VST_DUEDT) AS VST_DUEDT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND TEMP.CNTR_NO = TB_1.CNTR_NO AND TEMP.CNTR_SN = TB_1.CNTR_SN AND TEMP.VST_DUEDT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AS NEXT_SCHEDULE /* 다음BS방문일 */ , TB_4.FNL_AMT AS RENTAL_FEE /* 렌탈금액 */ , TB_6.PD_NM AS DEVICE_NAME FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ TB_1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS TB_2 ON ( TB_2.OG_TP_CD = TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND TB_2.PRTNR_NO = TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL TB_4 ON ( TB_4.CNTR_NO = TB_1.CNTR_NO AND TB_4.CNTR_SN = TB_1.CNTR_SN ) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS TB_6 ON ( TB_1.PDCT_PD_CD = TB_6.PD_CD ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.BC_NO = #{barcode} )

SELECT SERVICE_TYPE_NAME ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(VST_FSH_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(VST_FSH_HH,'HH24MISS'),'HH24:MI:SS') AS SERVICE_TIME ,SERVICE_NAME FROM ( SELECT TB_5.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD --코드명 조회 , TB_5.VST_FSH_DT , TB_5.VST_FSH_HH , TB_5.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', TB_5.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD) AS SERVICE_TYPE_NAME /* 서비스유형명 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TB_5.VST_FSH_DT || TB_5.VST_FSH_HH, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SERVICE_TIME /* 서비스방문일시 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', TB_5.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) AS SERVICE_NAME /* 서비스작업명 */ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ TB_1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS TB_2 ON ( TB_2.OG_TP_CD = TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND TB_2.PRTNR_NO = TB_1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ TB_5 ON ( TB_5.CNTR_NO = TB_1.CNTR_NO AND TB_5.CNTR_SN = TB_1.CNTR_SN ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.BC_NO = #{barcode} ) ORDER BY SERVICE_TIME DESC
